# Test static HTML generation

# Test static HTML generation with html extension
md2html -html output -html-ext html testsite
exists output/index.html
exists output/README.html
exists output/about.html
exists output/docs/guide.html

# Verify content contains expected HTML
grep '<title>' output/README.html
grep 'Welcome to the test site' output/README.html
grep '<title>' output/about.html
grep 'This is the about page' output/about.html
grep '<title>' output/docs/guide.html
grep 'This is documentation' output/docs/guide.html

# Verify links are properly converted
grep 'href="/about.html"' output/README.html
grep 'href="/README.html"' output/about.html

# Cleanup
rm -rf testsite output
